p: Table 3 shows the chemical composition of RC. The dry matter, crude ash, crude protein, acid detergent fiber (ADF), neutral detergent fiber (NDF), and ether extract were determined to be 90%, 9.42%, 20.6%, 16.8%, 25.1%, and 2%, respectively. Table 3 also shows the content of the bioactive compounds of RC. The total phenolic content was 48.39 mg of GAE/g DW, and total flavonoids were 9.76 mg of QE/g DW.
